entry.title: Contributing to Gaia (Firefox OS' User Interface layer), the complete guide
entry.content:
I really had to setup this whole jekyll thing to write this post because my previous blogger blog didn't like me.. Or it was me who didn't like it..
Either way let's get to business.


Table of content

  1. Intro
  2. What do you need before starting
  3. Git, Forking and setting up
  4. Here's Bugzilla, Now go fishing
  5. Git and your Bug's aftermath
    • A branch for your bug, in details
    • Commits according to Gaia, what, why and how
  6. Pushing pull requests
  7. Get your code reviewed and landed in Gaia
  8. That's all folks



1 - Intro

So you've heard about this Firefox OS and you knew enough about it that you are new very encouraged to contribute code
